      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">A molekuláris genetika eredményei</string>
            <string language="en-US">The Achievements Of Molecular Genetics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Ausführungen Der Molekularen Genetik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Accomplissements de la Génétique 
Moléculaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As Realizações De Genetics Molecular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I Successi Della Genetica Molecolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα επιτεύγματα της μοριακής γενετικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Logros De Genéticas Moleculares</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">A molekuláris genetikai kutatások rövid bemutatása - géntechnológia, idegen gének bevitele magasabb rendű élőlényekbe, klónozás</string>
            <string language="en-US">Short Presentation of the Research Related to Molecular Genetics - Genetic Technology, Input of Foreign Genes into Higher Creatures, Cloning</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">genetika</string>
            <string language="en-US">genetics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">molekuláris biológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">molecular biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu-HU">géntechnológia</string>
            <string language="en-US">gene technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurze Darstellung der Forschung in Verbindung 
gestanden auf molekularer Genetik - genetische Technologie, Input der 
fremden Gene in höhere Geschöpfe, klonend</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation courte de la recherche liée à la 
génétique moléculaire - technologie génétique, entrée des gènes
étrangers dans de plus hautes créatures, copiant</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação curta da pesquisa relacionada ao 
genetics molecular - tecnologia genetic, entrada de genes extrangeiros
em criaturas mais elevadas, cloning</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione corta della ricerca relativa alla 
genetica molecolare - tecnologia genetica, input dei geni stranieri 
nelle più alte creature, clonante</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομη παρουσίαση της έρευνας σχετικής με τη μοριακή
γενετική - γενετική τεχνολογία, είσοδος των ξένων γονιδίων στα 
υψηλότερα πλάσματα, κλωνοποίηση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación corta de la investigación 
relacionada con la genética molecular - tecnología genética, 
entrada de información de genes no nativos en criaturas más altas, 
reproduciéndose</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Genetik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">molekulare Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gentechnologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la génétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biologie moléculaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">technologie de gène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
